skills.title: Python
skills.description: Extensive experience using Python for data analysis, machine learning, and automation, with proficiency in libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-Learn.

skills.title: SQL

skills.title: R
skills.description: Proficient in using R for statistical analysis, data visualization, and creating reproducible reports with tools like ggplot2 and R Markdown.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: Experienced in developing and deploying machine learning models for predictive analytics, including feature engineering, model evaluation, and optimization.
